leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 医学影像-分割/检测/诊断生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→训练/推理→评测→部署
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 框架 + 标注/数据 + 部署

queries: [WEB] medical image segmentation evaluation metrics github
[WEB] uncertainty quantification tools for medical imaging github
[WEB] deep learning model calibration library github
[WEB] out of distribution detection medical images github
[WEB] medical image analysis validation framework github

tools.name: DINOv2-3D-Med
tools.one_line_profile: 3D implementation of DINOv2 for self-supervised pretraining on medical volumetric images
tools.detailed_description: A library providing a 3D adaptation of the DINOv2 self-supervised learning method, specifically designed for pretraining on volumetric medical imaging data (CT/MRI). It integrates with MONAI and PyTorch Lightning to facilitate robust feature learning from unlabeled 3D medical datasets.

tools.name: SlicerAutomatedDentalTools
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Slicer extension for automated dental image analysis
tools.detailed_description: A 3D Slicer extension that integrates automated tools for dental CBCT and IOS analysis, including segmentation and landmarking, facilitating clinical workflows and research in orthodontics.

tools.name: rse-grand-challenge-metrics
tools.one_line_profile: Helper library for creating evaluation metrics on Grand-Challenge.org
tools.detailed_description: A utility library designed to assist in the creation of evaluation containers and metrics for medical imaging challenges hosted on grand-challenge.org, ensuring standardized and robust performance assessment.

tools.name: Robust T-Loss
tools.one_line_profile: Robust loss function for medical image segmentation handling noisy labels
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the T-Loss function designed to be robust against noisy annotations in medical image segmentation tasks. It provides a drop-in replacement for standard loss functions to improve model reliability in the presence of imperfect ground truth.

tools.name: net:cal
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for measuring and mitigating miscalibration in uncertainty estimation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for assessing confidence calibration in neural networks. It provides methods for measuring miscalibration (ECE, MCE) and post-hoc calibration techniques (Temperature Scaling, Histogram Binning, etc.) to ensure reliable uncertainty estimates in AI models.

tools.name: TotalSegmentator-AIDE
tools.one_line_profile: TotalSegmentator packaged as a MONAI Application Package (MAP)
tools.detailed_description: A deployment-ready packaging of the TotalSegmentator tool, adhering to the MONAI Application Package (MAP) standard, designed for seamless integration into the AIDE platform for clinical AI deployment.

tools.name: UQ360
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty Quantification 360 toolkit
tools.detailed_description: An extensible open-source toolkit providing a comprehensive set of algorithms and metrics to estimate, communicate, and utilize uncertainty in machine learning models, enhancing transparency and trust in AI predictions.

tools.name: values
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for systematic validation of uncertainty estimation in semantic segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A framework developed by DKFZ for the systematic validation and comparison of uncertainty estimation methods specifically in the context of medical image semantic segmentation, enabling rigorous assessment of model reliability.

tools.name: segmentation_metrics
tools.one_line_profile: Library for computing medical image segmentation metrics
tools.detailed_description: A Python package dedicated to calculating a wide range of evaluation metrics for medical image segmentation tasks, including Dice, Hausdorff distance, and others, facilitating standardized performance reporting.

tools.name: VS_Seg
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic segmentation solver for Vestibular Schwannoma
tools.detailed_description: A specialized deep learning pipeline based on MONAI for the automatic segmentation of Vestibular Schwannoma from MRI scans, providing a ready-to-use solver for this specific clinical task.

tools.name: ITKPOCUS
tools.one_line_profile: Library for streaming and preprocessing point-of-care ultrasound video
tools.detailed_description: An open-source library developed by Kitware for handling point-of-care ultrasound (POCUS) video data, including streaming, preprocessing, and integration with ITK workflows.

tools.name: MEDIAR
tools.one_line_profile: Robust multi-modality microscopy image segmentation solver
tools.detailed_description: The winning solution for the NeurIPS 2022 CellSeg Challenge, providing a robust, data-centric and model-centric framework for segmenting cells across diverse microscopy modalities.

tools.name: torchmetrics
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning metrics for distributed PyTorch applications
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive collection of machine learning metrics implemented in PyTorch, designed for distributed training and scalability. It includes a wide array of metrics relevant to medical imaging (Dice, IoU, etc.) and ensures consistent evaluation across devices.

tools.name: fastMONAI
tools.one_line_profile: High-level wrapper for MONAI to simplify medical deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A low-code library that wraps MONAI functionalities to simplify the development of medical imaging deep learning pipelines, similar to how fastai wraps PyTorch, making advanced medical AI more accessible.

tools.name: mindGlide
tools.one_line_profile: Brain segmentation solver using MONAI and Dynamic Unet
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool for brain segmentation leveraging MONAI and Dynamic Unet architectures, providing a streamlined approach for processing neuroimaging data.

tools.name: MIALSRTK
tools.one_line_profile: Medical Image Analysis Laboratory Super-Resolution ToolKit
tools.detailed_description: A set of C++ and Python processing and workflow tools necessary to perform motion-robust super-resolution fetal MRI reconstruction in the BIDS Apps framework.

tools.name: MONAI Generative Models
tools.one_line_profile: Generative models framework for medical imaging
tools.detailed_description: A library that makes it easy to train, evaluate, and deploy generative models and related applications in the medical imaging domain.

tools.name: MONAI
tools.one_line_profile: AI Toolkit for Healthcare Imaging
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based, open-source framework for deep learning in healthcare imaging, providing domain-optimized foundational capabilities for training and deploying medical AI models.

tools.name: MONAI Label
tools.one_line_profile: Intelligent image labeling and learning tool
tools.detailed_description: An intelligent open source image labeling and learning tool that enables users to create annotated datasets and build AI models for clinical evaluation.

tools.name: SlicerMONAIViz
tools.one_line_profile: MONAIViz extension for 3D Slicer
tools.detailed_description: A 3D Slicer extension that provides visualization capabilities for MONAI models and outputs, integrating AI analysis into the Slicer workflow.

tools.name: VISTA
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile Imaging Segmentation and Annotation
tools.detailed_description: MONAI VISTA (Versatile Imaging Segmentation and Annotation) is a framework designed to facilitate generalized segmentation and annotation tasks in medical imaging.

tools.name: MONAI Deploy
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for deploying medical AI applications
tools.detailed_description: A framework to develop, package, test, deploy, and run medical AI applications (MAPs) in clinical production environments.

tools.name: MONAI Deploy App SDK
tools.one_line_profile: SDK for building medical AI applications
tools.detailed_description: A framework and set of tools to design, develop, and verify AI-driven applications in the healthcare imaging domain, enabling the creation of MONAI Application Packages (MAPs).

tools.name: MONAI Deploy Informatics Gateway
tools.one_line_profile: DICOM integration and data ingestion gateway
tools.detailed_description: A service that facilitates integration with DICOM compliant systems, enables ingestion of imaging data, and triggers workflows in the MONAI Deploy ecosystem.

tools.name: EvaluateSegmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for evaluating image segmentation quality
tools.detailed_description: A C++ program designed to evaluate the quality of image segmentations using various metrics, widely used for benchmarking in medical imaging challenges.

tools.name: im2im-uq
tools.one_line_profile: Image-to-image regression with uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch library for image-to-image regression with rigorous, distribution-free uncertainty quantification, applicable to various scientific imaging tasks.

tools.name: ml-calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for measuring and visualizing model calibration
tools.detailed_description: A library providing utilities for measuring calibration and plotting reliability diagrams, essential for evaluating the robustness and reliability of ML models in science.

tools.name: ASCENT
tools.one_line_profile: Cardiac ultrasound Segmentation & Color-doppler dealiasing Toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for cardiac ultrasound segmentation and color-doppler dealiasing, providing specific processing pipelines for echocardiography data.

tools.name: SALMON
tools.one_line_profile: Segmentation ALgorithm based on MONai
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning segmentation software based on the MONAI toolbox, designed for single and multi-label segmentation of 3D medical images.

tools.name: Hagelslag
tools.one_line_profile: Object-based severe weather forecast verification and segmentation tool
tools.detailed_description: Hagelslag is a Python library for object-based verification and segmentation of weather fields, specifically designed for severe weather forecasting. It supports tracking, performance diagrams, and reliability diagrams for calibration.

tools.name: MedMNIST-C API
tools.one_line_profile: Library for evaluating model robustness on MedMNIST-C datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to evaluate and enhance the robustness of medical image analysis models, specifically providing an API for the MedMNIST-C corrupted dataset benchmarks.

tools.name: MIScnn
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for Medical Image Segmentation with CNNs
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for setting up complete medical image segmentation pipelines using Convolutional Neural Networks, including data I/O, preprocessing, data augmentation, and model training.

tools.name: miseval
tools.one_line_profile: Metric library for Medical Image Segmentation Evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library dedicated to the evaluation of medical image segmentation models, providing a wide range of metrics to assess segmentation performance.

tools.name: temperature_scaling
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network calibration using Temperature Scaling
tools.detailed_description: A widely used implementation of Temperature Scaling, a simple and effective method to calibrate the probability outputs of neural networks.

tools.name: reliability-diagrams
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for classifier calibration
tools.detailed_description: A utility for creating reliability diagrams to visualize and quantify the calibration of classification models, helping to determine if model probabilities match empirical accuracy.

tools.name: SlicerMONAIAuto3DSeg
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Slicer extension for MONAI Auto3DSeg models
tools.detailed_description: An extension for the 3D Slicer platform that enables users to run MONAI Auto3DSeg models directly within the Slicer environment for automated medical image segmentation.

tools.name: MedPy
tools.one_line_profile: Medical image processing library in Python
tools.detailed_description: A library for medical image processing in Python, providing basic functionalities for reading, writing, and manipulating high-dimensional medical image data, as well as evaluation metrics.

tools.name: Calibration Wizard
tools.one_line_profile: Guidance system for camera calibration
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to guide users through the camera calibration process, optimizing for geometric and corner uncertainty to ensure high-quality calibration results.

tools.name: WaveBlocks
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for joint optimization of optics and deep learning
tools.detailed_description: An optimization framework developed in PyTorch that allows for the calibration and joint optimization of optical systems and deep learning models, facilitating computational imaging research.

tools.name: pymia
tools.one_line_profile: Data handling and evaluation library for medical image analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to facilitate data handling and evaluation in deep learning-based medical image analysis, providing flexible data loading and comprehensive metric calculation.

tools.name: uncertainty-wizard
tools.one_line_profile: Keras-based library for uncertainty-aware deep neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A plugin on top of tensorflow.keras that allows users to easily and efficiently create, train, and evaluate uncertainty-aware deep neural networks, supporting ensemble methods and stochastic sampling.

tools.name: MedSegBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking library for medical image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking tool that provides standardized access to 35+ medical segmentation datasets across different modalities, facilitating robust model evaluation and comparison.

tools.name: classifier-calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Library for classifier calibration techniques
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing post-hoc classifier calibration methods such as Platt's scaling and isotonic regression, along with visualization tools like reliability diagrams.
